name: Mythic Dungeon
description:
Asset Details:

Fantasy Mythic Dungeon offers you a tile-set in an old-school cave, which is inspired from Runescape following the set of elements as well as the environment with multiple options to your arsenal such as water-, ground-, empty Water-, tiles.

Technical Specifications:
  •  File Type ( .PNG )
  •  Element options < Animatable Sprite>
  •  Consists of 16x16, 32x32, 48x48 & 64x64 tiles
  •  Contents < Wall (2 Types), Wall-Tops (2 Types), Water / Lava Tiles, Chest & Barrels.>
  •   Combability  < Unity / GameMaker Studio / Unreal Engine / RPG Maker MV / RPG Maker MZ / RPG Maker Ace >
